observation: I can see a residence selection page with a dropdown for Country/region that currently shows 'Select'. There's also a language overlay that appears to be open with multiple language options visible. I need to close this language overlay first before proceeding with the country selection.
reasoning: As a normal user, I need to dismiss this language overlay that's blocking the main signup flow. I can see the X button in the top right corner to close it.
ux_issues: Language overlay keeps appearing and interrupting the signup flow

outcome.visual_observation: Language overlay was successfully closed. The colorful annotation boxes/highlights that were visible in the BEFORE screenshot have been removed in the AFTER screenshot. The main registration form remains visible with the country/region dropdown still showing 'Select' placeholder text, and all other UI elements (deriv logo, coin graphics, Next button, Log in link) are preserved in their clean state without visual annotations.
